UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Fine-Tuning of Alkaline Residues on the Hydrophilic Face Provides a Non-toxic Cationic α-Helical Antimicrobial Peptide Against Antibiotic-Resistant ESKAPE Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Luo X, Ye X, Ding L, Zhu W, Yi P, Zhao Z, Gao H, Shu Z, Li S, Sang M, Wang J, Zhong W, Chen Z

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptide Modifications against Clinically Isolated Antibiotic-Resistant Salmonella.
Literature.Author: Mangmee S, Reamtong O, Kalambaheti T, Roytrakul S, Sonthayanon P

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:73.1% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=4 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=67.09 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=10µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=10µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=5-10µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=10µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2.5-10µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=10µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=10µg/ml),Salmonella sp.(MIC=4µM),Salmonella sp.(MBC=4µM)
